Package Q4

Class CheckSum

java.lang.Object
Q4.CheckSum
public class CheckSum
extends java.lang.Object
Project: DataStructuresMidterm Package: Q4

Author:
Ibrahim Basar YARGICI Date 11/29/2020

Q4) A checksum is the 32-bit integer that is the sum of the Unicode characters in a file. Write a program to compute the checksum of a file that is supplied as a command-line argument.

Working pathname is .\src\Q4\text.txt

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    CheckSum()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static int checkSum​(java.lang.String text)
    This method will take a text as a parameter and will calculate the sum of characters inside of text.
    static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
    This is the main function which makes use of readFile and checkSum methods.
    static java.lang.String readFile​(java.lang.String pathname)
    This method will take path of file as a parameter and will return the text inside of this file.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • CheckSum

      public CheckSum()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      This is the main function which makes use of readFile and checkSum methods. User should give a pathname of a file as a first argument.
      Parameters:
      args - args[0] used as a path of file.

    • checkSum

      public static int checkSum​(java.lang.String text)
      This method will take a text as a parameter and will calculate the sum of characters inside of text.
      Parameters:
      text - This is a parameter whose sum of characters will be calculated.
      Returns:
      int This returns sum of characters in a file.

    • readFile

      public static java.lang.String readFile​(java.lang.String pathname)
      This method will take path of file as a parameter and will return the text inside of this file.
      Parameters:
      pathname - This is a pathname which shows us the path of file.
      Returns:
      String This is the text of the file.
